Docs.summary: Implements the FileClassifier task. Use the FileClassifier element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see [FileClassifier](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14e03310-fcc0-4bb2-a84d-cda12be66367).
